input.sentences: we spent the day with the kids .
they had a lot of fun .
then later on we had some fun to .
the kids hung out in the living room playing around .
output.sentences: The kids spent the day at Grandma's house.
They had a lot of fun with all of her toys.
Grandma had fun watching them play.
She loved watching them play, as they were her only living grand kids.
She took beautiful photos as they played well into the night.
